description:
Colby and Kenny both have really big feet. Colby wears like a size 15 and Kenny is a 12 (as memory serves). As a special treat for foot lovers, we do a side-by-side comparison before the action starts.
Speaking of feet, Colby has become quite the bottom and it's kinda hot seeing his big feet up in the air while a stud like Kenny fucks the shit out him. Colby and Kenny hit it off right away — I think the fact that Colby's cock was at attention the whole time his ass was getting pounded meant that he really liked Kenny!
title: Kenny & Colby
